pacmanprogram

Class VelocityChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacmanprogram.VelocityChecker

  • public class VelocityChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class determines whether the movement specified by a key press if valid. For example, if the player presses the right arrow key to move Pacman right, this class will check to see if Pacman is actually allowed to move in that direction. It will also "remember" key strokes so that Pacman will move in the specified direction at the next available opportunity.

    • Method Detail

      • velocityCheck

        public java.util.HashMap<VelocityChecker.typeVel,java.lang.Double> velocityCheck(double xCoordinate,
                                                                        double yCoordinate,
                                                                        double xVelocity,
                                                                        double yVelocity,
                                                                        double preVelX,
                                                                        double preVelY,
                                                                        double keyStrokeRemember,
                                                                        int keyCode)
        This is the only method that needs to be used by other classes. It returns information about what position and speed Pacman should have.
        Parameters:
        xCoordinate - The current position of Pacman in the x direction.
        yCoordinate - The current position of Pacman in the y direction.
        xVelocity - The current velocity of Pacman in the x direction.
        yVelocity - The current velocity Pacman in the y direction.
        preVelX - The previous velocity of Pacman in the x direction.
        preVelY - The previous velocity of Pacman in the y direction.
        keyStrokeRemember - This determines whether a pressed key should be remembered for later use.
        keyCode - This is the code corresponding to the key that the user pressed.
        Returns:
        a hash map that contains all the information required for moving Pacman with the arrow keys.
